snippet: Minutes from the Federal Reserve’s latest policy meeting showed that officials were concerned that a slowdown in China would hold back the U.S. economy.
abstract: Stock indexes rise after Federal Reserve announces that it will not raise interest rates.
lead_paragraph: Minutes from the Federal Reserve’s latest policy meeting showed that officials were concerned that a slowdown in China would hold back the U.S. economy.

headline.main: Signs That Fed Won’t Raise Rates Soon Lift Shares
headline.print_headline: Signs That Fed Won’t Raise Rates Soon Lift Shares
